Package com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.displayhelpers

Class PoolTable

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Widget
com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.displayhelpers.PoolTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout
public final class PoolTable extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Widget
Renders the pool table surface, balls, cue, and guide. Handles pointer-based aiming for the cue ball.

Inputs:

  • PoolTable.PowerProvider supplies current cue power (0..1)
  • PoolTable.GuideCapper clamps the guide length in pixels based on physics raycasts

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    PoolTable.GuideCapper
    Caps the guide length (in pixels) based on the current physics state.
    static interface 
    PoolTable.PowerProvider
    Supplies the current cue power in the range [0..1].
